name: Hyakki Yako II: Purgatory Purge (BETA)
description:
GET THE HELL OUT

Step into the three-piece suit of Haramita Renkai, salaryman by day and exorcist by night, as he ventures into Purgatory to rescue a missing child and defeat the invading forces of Hell.  

Immerse yourself in gravity-bending surreal environments, strike at Hell's legions with satisfying first-person melee and magic combat, and meet Purgatory's colorful and strange inhabitants.  

(NOTE: this is a beta build of the game, which is still a work in progress.  Everything is subject to change and the story is far from finished, and may contain some inconsistencies.  This is also a sequel to a student game we made last year, which we plan to remaster and publish on itch soon)
